short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nice app for adding notes and strucuring them by sections with multiple pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Application for creating notes, which can be grouped by sections, every section can have multiple pages.

Key features of app:
 - you can create as many sections/pages as you want, there are no any limitations
 - there are various themes, which are continuously added
 - app size/zoom can be changed according to your preferences
 - you can export/import sections (for now syncing within account are not implemented

Any suggestions of wishes to app functionality are very welcome, so please leave a comments which additional functionality you would like to have or you don't like.
